1.content:
You go to a sleepover party with a bunch of the YGO boys. You all have lots of fun, but you notice the boys are playing a game where the loser of the game gets tickled. You laugh, thinking it's all so silly and adorable. Suddenly, you decide to join in. You play against your favourite boy and surprisingly win. Great! That means that you get to tickle him!

But before we go any further, who was the boy you played against?
1.title: The Party

12.content:
"No! Impossible!" Kaiba says, sweat dropping from his brow. "I was winning! This can't have happened!"

You smile deviously at him. "Fair is fair, Kaiba. Now come accept your fate!"

"No!" he cries. "I demand a re-match!"

Yugi shakes his head. He puts a hand on your shoulder in support. "It's okay," he tells you, "You don't have to accept his re-match if you don't want to. You won fair and square."

Kaiba looks from Yugi back to you.

"So which is it?" he asks, trying to remain stoic. "Will you accept a re-match or won't you...?"

You look at Kaiba, at how close he is to flushing in shame, and think about it. You decide to...
12.title: Kaiba

122.content:
A teasing, giddy tone comes into your voice.

"Why is it that you want a rematch, exactly...?"

You wiggle your fingers in the air in a clawing motion.

"Are you really that sensitive?"

His cheeks start turning pink. "No! I don't have to explain myself to you!"

You notice his fists squeeze together and tense. He probably hates you for dragging this out. All of his friends are watching, and you chose to publicly embarrass him.

Oh well. Totally worth it...

May as well cut to the chase...

*go back and skip to the 'get on with the tickling' chapter*
122.title: embarrass Kaiba more!

123.content:
"Time to accept your doom, Mr. High-and-Mighty CEO!" You wiggle your fingers in the air, making his cheeks tint a rose colour. Then you crawl up to him. He still maintains a silent dignity despite all this, his white coat still looking beautiful as ever, even slightly crumpled, in his current sitting position on the floor.

You doubt you'll be able to tackle Kaiba successfully, being that he's so tall, so you instead settle for getting him in his current position, tickling his ribs and sides and trying to get his armpits before he squeezes his arms tightly against his body.

The rest of the gang looks on in awe. Would you be able to make Kaiba laugh? What would a non-haughty laugh from him even sound like?

Kaiba does his best to resist. He fights the grin that threatens to appear on his face. Finally, he can fight it no more. He smiles with just his lips, and keeps fighting the spasms of his body. He tries to curl up but there's always a vulnerable spot you can get to.

Everyone watches in awe as you keep tickling him, waiting for the explosion of laughter. You get his neck, underarms, back, under the knee area, the tops of his knees, and his belly.

He's held out this long, and you can't help feel proud of him. Who else could have lasted...?

Finally, you pull off his boots, the socks deciding to stay inside. He covers his bare feet almost instantly.

Hmm... interesting.
123.title: get on with the tickling!

13.content:
"Oh no!" Mokuba says, crawling away. "No, no, no, no!"

You can't help giggle a little at him. "Mokuba, you knew the stakes when you joined in! Now face it like a grown up!"

He shakes his head. "You don't understand! I thought I'd win! I don't want to be tickled!"

You raise an eyebrow. "Does Seto tickle you a lot?"

He looks away, sweat dropping from his brow.

Suddenly you feel bad for him. If his brother tickled him a lot, of course he wouldn't want this. "Next time, I'll get Seto back for you, okay?"

He looks up and nods. "Okay."

"Perfect!" You say, and without further ado, you wrap him in a tickle-hold and get him all over.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAA!! AHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Mokuba cries.

He's especially sensitive around his belly and navel, so you focus on those areas for a while.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAA!! AHAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHHA!! STAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAP! I CAHAHAHAHAAN'T TAHAHAHAKE IHIHIHIT!!"

You stop all of a sudden when you hear Seto whisper in your ear.

"Try blowing raspberries on his stomach. You won't regret it."

Hmm... You decide to:
13.title: Mokuba

131.content:
"Good idea!" you whisper back to Seto. He grins maliciously.

You lay Mokuba on his back and start blowing raspberries on his stomach.

He screams in between laughing. He tries to beg for mercy but only a squeal comes out.

You think, 'This has got to be the cutest and funniest thing ever!'

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH!! "EEEEEEEKK! AHAHAHAAHAHAHA! HAHAHAHAHHHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! EEEEEEK!"

You blow a raspberry in his navel, earning the most high-pitched scream yet!

"EEEEEEKK! AHAHAHHAHAAHAHAHHAAHAHA! HAHAHHAHAHAA!"

You tickle his stomach with your fingers, as he's just too cute for you not to. He continues laughing and frantically squirming. Seto chuckles and decides to join in.

Seto uses a single long, slender finger to tickle his brother's stomach. He swirls his finger around the outside of his navel and then dips it inside, continuing to swirl. Meanwhile, you keep blowing raspberries on his upper belly.

"AHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAHHA! HAHAHHHAHAAHAHHAAHA! STOP! STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!! HAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHA!" Mokuba cries.

You don't stop until there are tears rolling down Mokuba's cheeks.

The three of you lay on the floor breathing heavily, catching your breath from laughing so much.

"That was fun," you say after you've caught your breath.

"Yeah," Seto says. Mokuba breathes hard.

"You know I love you two," he says, "but never do that to me again."

"No promises." You say teasingly.

Then you eye Seto. "But you know, I DID promise you I'd get Seto for tickling you so much!"

Mokuba grins. Both of you then leap on Seto. Mokuba holds him while you tickle him.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHA!" Seto laughs, kicking and blushing hard. "HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHHAHAAHHA!"

When it's over, Mokuba high fives you. But Seto isn't pleased. He didn't like feeling helpless and the other boys possibly overheard his laughter. Plus, you've just initiated a challenge! Uh oh!

To accept Seto's challenge, go back to the 'Seto' section of the story. Otherwise: hurray! You've had a fun night with Mokuba and Seto that everyone enjoyed! :) You win!

~ The End! ~
131.title: blow raspberries

132.content:
You tickle his feet, but find they aren't as sensitive as his stomach.

He still laughs though.

"HHAHAHAHAHHHAHHA! AHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHHAAHA!!"

Finally, you stop, satisfied. Mokuba catches his breath.

"No fair!" he cries.

"Next time don't accept silly challenges, and this won't happen."

Mokuba pouts. He knows you're right, but he'll never admit it. You smirk, but he looks away.

"Do you know why I don't like being tickled?" Mokuba asks. You shake your head. You'd always assumed he naturally didn't like it. "Can I tell you a story? It happened not too long ago..."

You nod, curious.
132.title: tickle his feet

choices: He gives Mokuba one last chance before his doom.
1321.content:
"Get off me, you creep!"

Mokuba struggled in Kemo's arms, being taken to Pegasus' castle at Duelist Kingdom.

He had his hands tied and was thrown into a helicopter. Then Kemo and Pegasus got in after him and took off.

They arrived at the castle, and Mokuba was taken to his room in the castle tower.

Pegasus stood in front of Mokuba, glaring down at him.

"Now then, Mokuba-boy, do tell me where the key to Kaiba Corp is. I can't access your brother's files without it..."

Mokuba glared back and refused to answer.

"That's how it's going to be, hmm...?" Pegasus said. "Well, we can find ways to change that."

He laid Mokuba down on a table and strapped his wrists and ankles down, so he could hardly move.

"Tell me, Mokuba-boy... are you like me when I was a little boy? Can you simply not stand to be tickled?"

At hearing this, Mokuba's eyes widened and he struggled hard to break free.

"Is it that bad?" Pegasus chuckled. "Oh dear!"

He lifted Mokuba's shirt, exposing his stomach to the cool air. Then he took a feather from his pocket and dragged it slowly over his stomach, making the boy twitch and hold his breath.
1321.title: "It happened at Duelist Kingdom..."

13211.content:
"I'll give you one more chance, Mokuba. Where is the key?"

Mokuba grit his teeth and refused to answer.

"Okay, then, Mokuba. We did it the easy way. Now we'll do it the hard way."

Pegasus put the feather back into his pocket and decided to use his fingers to tickle the boy. He ran his fingers up and down along Mokuba's sides, moving them quickly. Then he tickled his neck and under his chin. And then he dug into his armpits mercilessly. Finally, Mokuba broke.

"HAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAAA! AHAAHAHAAHAAHAHAHAHA! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! HAHAAHHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHA!"

Pegasus stopped, to let Mokuba hear his teasing. "Aww... poor adorable little Mokuba! He has a secret he isn't willing to share! It's too bad he has to be so rude! Or else we could simply let him go!"

Mokuba glared. "You're the one who's rude! I don't kidnap innocent people and torture them!"

Pegasus looked at Mokuba knowingly. "Are you really so innocent, Mokuba? Are you...?"

He faltered. Bowing his head, he closed his eyes, ashamed. "...No."

"I didn't think so." Deep down, Pegasus felt bad. He knew why Mokuba thought he wasn't innocent. It wasn't because he went down the wrong path and made some mean friends back when he was imitating Seto.

'Poor little Mokuba. You really think that what your stepfather did to you was your fault. But it's not... Truth is, Mokuba-boy, he was a sick man and you did nothing wrong...'

"Don't feel bad, Mokuba-boy. I'm sorry... you are innocent. I was wrong."
13211.title: He gives Mokuba one last chance before his doom.

132111.content:
Pegasus laughs, amused. "Don't get me wrong, Mokuba-boy. I feel sorry about what happened to you, but that doesn't mean you're off the hook. You still haven't told me where the key is..."

Mokuba gulped. Wait? What happened to him? Did - did Pegasus just read his mind?

He shielded his thoughts even more. There was no way he was going to find out where the key was that way!

'Hmm... you're very brave, Mokuba. I admire that.' Pegasus thought, frowning. 'It's going to take a lot to make this boy talk.'

He took Mokuba's shoes off. Then he smiled at him teasingly.

The boy clenched his teeth, readying himself. Pegasus slipped his socks off, and then took out the feather again. He ran the feather up and down Mokuba's soles.

"AHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAH! AHaAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAAHA!"

There were squeaks and squeals when he ran the feather in between his toes.

"EEK!! AHAHHAHAHAHAHA! AHHAAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAHAHAHAHAH!"

Pegasus gave him a small break for air. Then he asked him for information again. Finally, when Mokuba wouldn't talk, he started to tickle again, this time on his upper body.

He tickled Mokuba's navel with his finger, getting a jackpot of laughter.

"EHEHEHEheheHEHEEHEeHHEE! AHAHAHhaAHAHAHaaHAHAHAHHA!! HahaAHAHAHAHAHahaHAAHaaHAAHHAHAhahaHAHA!"

"Tell me where the key is!" Pegasus demanded, without stopping.

"NEVER!!" Mokuba yelled, laughing all the while. Truth be told, he was having a hard time keeping the secret for this long, but he knew he had to hold onto it, or Kaiba Corp would be stolen from him and his brother forever!

Pegasus saw this, and he decided to speed things up a little. "Kemo, come here. Help me tickle Mokuba-boy some more!"
132111.title: "Really? Then you'll let me go...?"

1321111.content:
Kemo decided to tickle Mokuba's feet while Pegasus continued tickling his stomach.

Mokuba went into hysterics and couldn't speak anymore. His face was covered in tears and sweat. It was all too much for him.

"HAHAHAHAhaAHAAHAHAHAHAHhaHAhaaHAAHAHHAAHAHahahAHA!!"

Finally, Mokuba passed out.

Pegasus was disappointed, but admitted they went a bit too far. He unstrapped Mokuba from the table, and brought him back to his room. He placed him in the bed, and then left. Mokuba woke up a few hours later.

'That's it!' Mokuba thought, getting up and brushing himself off. 'This place is a nightmare! I've gotta get out of here!'

So Mokuba thought of a plan to escape the castle tower.

~ End Flashback ~

"And that's the story," Mokuba said, turning his gaze to the floor.

You felt really bad for him. "I'm sorry to hear that, Mokuba."

You hug him. His yellow coat feels really soft, and his hair feels smooth and coarse. The warmth of huddling together feels nice.

Finally, you release from the hug.

"Feel better?" you ask.

"A little..."

You want to cheer him up, so you offer him...
1321111.title: "With pleasure, boss..."

13211111.content:
You'd helped Yugi's mom bake some cookies earlier in the day. She walks out of the kitchen now, offering you and Mokuba some.

You both take a cookie, smiling at her and saying thanks.

She sits with you for a while, talking about how her recent trip to Egypt went. It was a normal expedition, with none of the freaky stuff Yugi often encounters. She brought back a shiny green scarab necklace souvenir, but it wasn't cursed or anything.

When she finishes her story, both you and Mokuba feel relaxed. Your bellies are full and you all feel satisfied.

It was the perfect distraction from Mokuba's traumatic tale. He was able to sleep well that night, no nightmares whatsoever.

Excellent choice, reader! :) You get bonus cookies!

~ The End! ~
13211111.title: some cookies

choices: You sit down on a couch. Mokuba lays down and spreads himself out.
13211112.content:
"Mokuba, I know this may sound crazy, but I have an idea. You may not like it and you may refuse to do it. But unless we get to the root of the problem, there's no fixing it."

"What do you mean...?"

"I mean we have to give you more good tickles to cancel out the bad ones."

"I'm confused..."

"You need to feel free to fight me off. If you can manage to feel safe during this, not like you're completely powerless like before, maybe you'll be able to heal."

He looks away. "I-I don't know... I'm scared."

You nod. "It's okay to feel scared. You don't have to go through with this if you don't want to."

He looks up at you with glistening eyes.

"It's okay. I want to."
13211112.title: more tickles

132111121.content:
"Are you ready?" you ask. He nods, looking up at you with big indigo eyes.

He's so adorable, you just want to wrap him in a blanket and protect him from all harm forever.

But you also made Mokuba a promise. That you'd help him overcome his pain. 'You can do this,' you think to yourself.

Slowly, you run a finger along his ribs... He giggles lightly.

"Come on, more! More!" Mokuba cries. At his prompting, you attack both his armpits at the same time, making him cry out in laughter. "HAHAHHAhahaHaHAHAA! AHAAHAhAHaAHaAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

He wiggles from side to side, trying to get away while also balancing himself so he doesn't fall off the couch.

Successfully, he fights off your tickle attacks, even though you keep coming back, getting him in different areas.

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHA!! NOT THE TOES! HAHAHAAHAHHAHHAHAHA! OH NO NOT MY BELLY BUTTON!!" He rolls over to avoid you targeting his stomach, while making the fatal mistake of exposing his sides.

You giggle, mercilessly wiggling your fingers on them. Mokuba screams and falls off the couch.

"Mokuba!" you cry, kneeling down beside him. Suddenly, you turn serious, the smile fading from your lips. You start inspecting him for injuries.

He laughs, pushing your hands away. "Oh, stop! Hehe! You're such a mom friend!"

You cross your arms. "I am not a mom friend!"

He holds his stomach, laughing again. "You are! Just look at how you always worry about me." He stops giggling, eyes turning bright and serious. "I'm glad you care, though. Don't get me wrong."

You hug him again and give him one last playful tickle. He giggles and squirms away.

"So did you like the tickling?" you ask, curious. You hope he had a better time this time than before. He nods happily.

"Yeah, it was definitely better than that time. And also whenever Seto tickles me, he's always merciless, like it's some sort of game he's got to win. It's just the kind of person he is, but I wish he was gentler." He smiles up at you. "This time was definitely the best. It was just right. Thanks."

"You're welcome, kiddo. And hey, I could always convince him to be gentler with you, next time I see your brother."

"I doubt he'll listen, but thanks." He gives you one last hug. You return it, glad you were able to help Mokuba with his troubles. Then he moves suddenly. You release him. "Oh! It's getting late! I should get to bed soon!"

You nod and decide to prepare for bed too. The sleepover has almost ended and the rest of the group looks tired. You may as well take advantage of the fact most of the others are more immersed in their games than you two and beat them to the bathroom!

~ The End ~
132111121.title: You sit down on a couch. Mokuba lays down and s...

13211113.content:
He accepts the offer, and hugs you again. This time it's warmer. He trusts you more and relaxes into the hug.

"Thanks for understanding," he whispers.

"It's no problem," you say, patting him on the back. Some time passes, and finally, you release.

Mokuba half smiles. "I should find Seto now. He's probably worried about me."

"Go on then. I think I saw him challenge Yami to a game in the other room a minute ago. They should still be at it."

Mokuba thanks you and heads off to find his brother.

~ The End ~
13211113.title: another hug

choices: "I-I-I was just stretching! Not trying to run away!"
"Looks like we're gonna have to summon the tickle monster on your ribbies"
The Kaiba boys do stick togethe! Looks like your gonna get it now!"
"How about a duel Noah? I've got a special deck that'll tickle your fancy."
14.content:
Noah audibly yiped when he realized he'd lost looking towards you and swallowing hard as you wiggled your fingers. He turned to his brothers and yelled about the Kaiba brothers sticking together and then yelled when they picked him up and brought his kicking form over to you. You took the little computer genius into your lap and whispered him commands he was to run if he didn't want Tickle.exe to go into overclock. He was to sit on your lap indian style and play a trivia game. You placed your nails on his soles and kept them threateningly still as you asked him the first question.

"Okay Noah. What does Pot of Greed do?"
"It lets you draw TWOHOHOOO CAHAHARDS! STAHAHAP!"
Your nails pinched the blushing balls of his feet while Seto pushed down on his shoulders to keep the real "Kaiba" playing.
"Mmm sorry Noah but it only says draw two cards, nothing about giggling like a tickly baby who better not try to run again! So since you got it wroooong...TICKLES!"
"NOHOOOHOOO PLEEEHEEASE! GAHAHA!!"
"Sorry Noah but my special ability is that whenever you get a wrong answer you have to tribute five toes to summon the tickle monster on a poor little loser's foot. KITCHY-KITCHY!"
"YOHOHOUR EVIHIL! SETO HEHEHELP!"
"Next question Noah. When you have five thousand life points and your opponent has one thousand what should you do?"
"Ata-ACKAHAHAAHA! WHAHAHAT WAS THE RIGHT ONE?!"
"Probably attack but without all the squeaking and begging like someone was scratching at your toe stems like they wanted you to lose."
"YOHOHOU DID THAHAHT THOUGH!"
"I can't understand you Noah I only speak Japanese not Tickle Baby who just lost another five toes TO THE TICKLE MONSTER!"
"GAHAHAHA NOOHOO MEHEHERCY!"
"Oh poo fine Noah. Seto can you get him some water? Pretty please?"
Noah tried to unfold his legs but a pair of pinches to his big toes and you pulled him back into position.
"Uh-uh mister man where are you going?
14.title: Noah

15.content: Who else was it, then?
15.title: Other

151.content:
"Congratulations," Yami says. "You won. You played like a true duelist."

You smile at him. "And so did you."

"I am willing to fulfill my end of the bargain." He stands up, stretches his arms out, and closes his eyes, ready to take your tickle attack.
151.title: Yami

155.content:
'Leon is so good at games! It's a wonder I defeated him!' you think. 'Then again, I did choose a game of luck rather than skill...'

Leon looks at you expectantly. "W-well, you won... so uh..." He fights a blush that rises to his cheeks.

You smile at him. Did he have a kiddy crush on you? Or is he just afraid of being tickled? You wonder about that blush.

He breaks you out of your thoughts, growling impatiently.

"Just... just get it over with!"

"Alright!" you say. You leap at him, knocking him on his back. You look like a cheetah that's just caught its prey. "Now feel the taste of defeat, Leon! Hahahaha!"

You can't help but chuckle as you tickle him all over. He breaks into laughter before you even touch him.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA!" he cries, shielding his stomach and trying to roll over on his back. "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHA! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHAHAAHA!!"

He's so adorable you can't help but tease him a little.

"Wow! Who knew the heir to the Von Schroeder fortune could be so very cute and ticklish? Tickle-tickle-tickle!"

His blush deepens. "HAHAHAHHAHAAHA! HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA! STAHAHAHAHAHAHAHP!! I'M BEGGING YOU! AHAHAHAAHA!!"

You feel kind of sorry for him, being so ticklish. On the other hand, you love hearing his laugh. What do you do?
155.title: Leon

1551.content:
"OH NO!" he cries, seeing as you've redoubled your efforts. "AHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAA!! AHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHA!"

You laugh along with him, tickling his underarms, neck, sides, stomach, and feet.

"HAHAHAAHAHAHAHHAAHAHA!!"

He seems to laugh the most when you tickle his neck, underarms, and feet. Hmm... but which of these is his most ticklish spot? You decide to find out. Which spot do you guess is his most sensitive?
1551.title: Keep tickling

15511.content:
"Heheheheehehhee!!" he giggles as you go for his neck. You smile.

"Is this your most ticklish spot?" you ask. He shakes his head.

"It's my third most ticklish. But nice guess!" he says.

Okay, so it wasn't his neck. You decide to think it through a little more.

~ Go back to previous page ~
15511.title: Neck

15512.content:
He laughed a lot when you got his armpits! So you decide to tickle them, hoping for a laugh jackpot.

"AHAHAHA! HAHAAHHAAHAHAHAHA!!"

'Perfect!' You think.

"Is this your most ticklish spot?" you ask him curiously.

He shakes his head. "It's my second most ticklish. But nice guess! They are very sensitive!"

At hearing him say this, you tickle them again, making him chortle.

"HAHAHHAHAHAHHAHHA!"

~ Go back to previous chapter ~
15512.title: Underarms

15513.content:
You tickle Leon's feet, getting the tops, underneath, sides, toes, and all the area in-between his toes.

If you wanted a laughter jackpot, you got it! He squeals before going into hysterics, holding his stomach from laughing so much.

"HAHHAHAHAHAHHHA!! PLEASE! STAHAHAHAAHAHP! NOT THE FEET! ANYWHERE BUT THERE!! AHAHAHAAHAHAHHHAAHAHHAAHA!!"

"Is this your most sensitive spot?" You ask him. He nods furiously.

"YEHEHEEHESS IHIHIHIIT IHIHIHIHIS!! NOW PLEHEHEHEHEASE STAHAHAHAHAP!!"

You stop tickling him, as requested.

He breathes heavily, glad to finally catch his breath.

"Wow," he says when he can finally speak. "That was brutal!"

You feel a little sorry for him. You pat him on the shoulder. "Tell you what, Leon. You can get me next time for free. Promise."

"Really?" he says, giggles still seeping into his words.

You nod. "I promise."

He smiles. "Thanks."

The two of you decide to play another board game until the end of the party. No stakes this time. Then you decide to go to sleep.

"Goodnight, Leon," you say. "Sweet dreams."

The two of you hug. Then you walk to bed and unzip your sleeping bags. You crawl in and fall asleep almost immediately. What a fun night!

~ The End ~
15513.title: Feet

1552.content:
"Hehehe, that was fun!" you say. You stop tickling Leon, as you're sure he deserves a break now. He breathes heavily, catching his breath.

"Wow," he said. "R-remind me to never play games of luck with you again!"

You falter, a bit disappointed. "Aw, Leon, didn't you like the tickling...?"

"I did!" he says. Then he looks away, blushing. "But it was also embarrassing..."

"Well... yeah..." you admit. You'd probably feel the same way in his place. But you smile at recollecting how bashful he acts around you. Maybe the two of you would play more games together another day. And maybe then Leon would finally admit to his crush on you!

~ The End! ~
1552.title: Have mercy

info.brief_description: There's one for the girls, so why not the boys? Tickle your favorite YGO boys here!
info.description: First question. Who are we going to tickle tonight?
